wikipedia_page.main: Donna Bernard (born January 1964) is a British journalist and TV presenter best known for her work at the BBC and GMTV.

link_mentions.page: List of GMTV presenters and reporters

response: A number of specials and spin-off shows were also aired, including five series of 999 Lifesavers (1994–98) hosted by Buerk and Juliet Morris (later replaced by Donna Bernard), and 999 International in 1997.
